caption.p: Effect of Ellagic acid treatment on kidney iNOS against lead acetate induced Nephrotoxicity. All values are mean ± SEM, n = 8, ∗∗∗P < 0.001 when compared to Negative control; ###P < 0.001 compared to Positive control group. EA 50: Ellagic acid (50 mg/kg) EA 25: Ellagic acid (25 mg/kg). NC: Negative Control, PC: Positive Control.
